This is the homepage for users of the Bioinformatics Core at the Discovery Research Platform for Hidden Cell Biology at the University of Edinburgh.

<br>

![](images/DRP_logo_horizontal_transparent.png)

<br>

You will find details on how to access training courses as well as best-practice documentation for using our in house servers and other useful resources.

For more information on how to access or collaborate with the Bioinformatics Core, please see the [DRP-HCB website](https://biology.ed.ac.uk/drp).
